message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. It's a great deal for something of such high quality.
Hi Alice, I think $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $120 for the product.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit to $135, but that's my bottom price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product.
